Scrapper stood to the side. "well --wel- ahhh" he said as Havotron through a glair his way.  

"Go begin outside."

Scrapper ran out.

"This, my dear Megatron, is no joke.  Not even a laughing matter, well for me it is, you....well you should be a little more concerend.  Now that I have pinpointed your position, I shall be there to talk in person, and take rightful control of my men.  My ETA is 1 hours twenty minutes.  I have two men that should be arriving shortly before.  Be prepared to stand down."  Havotron looked at Megatron, smiled, then lifted a finger and brought it down on the close communication button, the screen dying.  "Hahahaha."

Havotron walked out to see the bridge platforms complete (sorry i really need them to be done, are we still doing what we planned with the Constructicons).  He looked at the new bots.  "You want an alliance, follow us immediatly then."  Thinking to himself ' Hmm, i shall take over them too.'

"Spinster, Constructicons, Needlenose, follow me.  Nightmare, Jagged, Apeface, stay here to protect the base.  Apeface try adn reach Slugslinger and report to Tremor every so often. " With that Havotron blasted off into the air Needlenose transforming and following with Scrapper hanging onto him.


nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com wrote:
>
> Spinister nodded to Havotron, then bowed, and slowly backed away. Ever
> silently, he headed towards the large hole in the craft, and leapt out,
> his arms extended, as he gracefully, and quietly landed on a part of the
> ship. He looked up, and saw some creatures had neard, and he stood up,
> and paced behind the structure holding the wing, but did not reapear.
> ______________________________________________________________________
> 
> Megatron looked at Havotron for a good minute, then his lips curled in a
> sneer. His eyes flared, almost as if to say, how dare you. Then he
> reared his head back, and began to chuckle. "Mwha ha ha ha ha ha. Who do
> you think you are? Scrapper, is this some kind of joke?" Megatron asked.
> He was a little confused.
>
